title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured online store with real-time inventory, customer accounts, and secure payment processing. Built for optimal performance and conversion rates.

title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics dashboard for SaaS businesses. Features include user tracking, revenue metrics, and customizable reports with beautiful data visualizations.

title: Content Management System
description: A modern headless CMS built for content creators and developers. Features a user-friendly interface, robust API, and flexible content modeling.

title: Task Management App
description: A productivity tool for teams and individuals. Features include task assignment, progress tracking, and deadline management with beautiful UI.
